mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY bid DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY bid DESC LIMIT 0, 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( bid, name, password, phone, title, comment ) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(bid)+1, 1) FROM board b), #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{title}, #{comment} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET name=#{name}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, title=#{title}, comment=#{comment}, reg_date=#{reg_date} WHERE bid=#{bid}
UPDATE board SET ref=ref+1 WHERE bid=#{bid}
